description:
Usopp reaches deep into his devious bag of tricks to even the odds in his battle with Perona. Meanwhile, Luffy can`t lay a finger on Gecko Moria, and a zombie is less than gentlemanly in his battle with Robin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La bête noire de Perona ! L’usurpateur signe d’un U, qui veut dire Usopp
Perona Is Terrified!! Usopp and Untruthful Share the Same `U`!
Perona Kyoufu!? Uso no U wa Usopp no U
Usopp e la strategia della menzogna
Перона в ужасе! Усопп – мастер лжи
بيرونا مذعورة!! `ب` الّتي في أوسوبّ هي `ب` الّتي في كذب
ペローナ恐怖!? 嘘のウはウソップのウ
